# Active Dashboards (SY22-23)

<br>

<a href="https://youtu.be/mRBWfdjEv-4">End of Session Dashboard Tutorial</a>  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="https://youtu.be/dxE-PciN-ZY">Facilitator Facing Dashboard Tutorial</a>
<br>
<br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="https://youtu.be/KZsLENMy8cg">End of Course Dashboard Tutorial</a>

```{r active-dashboards, echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)

report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c(
    "Facilitator facing dashboards", # 1
    "Coaching facing dashboards", # 2
    "Internal Participant Feedback Dashboard", # 3
    "Educator Survey Dashboard", # 4
    "Knowledge Assessments Dashboards", # 5
    "IPG Dashboard", # 6
    "Student Survey Dashboard", # 7
    "EIC Student Survey Dashboard", # 8
    "Student Work Graded Dashboard"
  ), # 9
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/FacilitatorFacingDashboard.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/CoachingFacingDashboard.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsSession.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsDiagnosticDashboard.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsKnowledgeAssessment.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsIPGDashboard.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsStudentSurvey.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsStudentSurvey.png"),
    here::here("Images/Dashboards/StudentWorkGraded.png")
  ),
  link = c(
    "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/FacilitatorAuth/", # Facilitator board 1
    "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/CoachingAuth/", # Coaching board 2
    "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/web/6317cbd1f9feca001046524d", # End of Session 3
    "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/63053d35379f890010cc456e?pageId=Page_fcc6840b-679e-4652-b50c-6a95853b5887", # Educator Survey 4
    "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/KnowledgeAssessments2022-2023/", # Knowledge Assessments 5
    "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/6349bfbbb614690016a0b7b1", # Classroom Observations 6
    "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/6345c33160c27c00166cb726?pageId=Page_ee9d1195-c476-4414-b1ab-ee2da2fdb4ce", # Student Survey 7
    "https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/636172f94060140010530cc8?pageId=Page_35ff03a3-5111-48b5-abcd-ecfca4249e62", # EIC Student Survey 8
    "https://teachinglabhq.shinyapps.io/student_work_graded/" # 9
  )
)

report_galleries |>
  cards(
    title = "",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```

# Visualizations

<br>

```{r visualizations, echo = F}
time_diff <- Sys.Date() - as.Date("2019-01-01")
year_diff <- round(as.numeric(time_diff) / 365)
galleries3 <- tibble::tibble(
  long_name = c(
    "Visualizing and textualizing TL data.",
    "How much does each US state spend per kid per capita over time?"
  ),
  blurb = c(
    paste0("A visualization of ", year_diff, " years of reviews of Teaching Lab courses by type of content."),
    ""
  ),
  image_url = c(
    here::here("Images/Visualizations/Reviews.png"),
    here::here("Images/Visualizations/SpendingperKid.png")
  ),
  link = c(
    "https://teachinglab.github.io/TLReviews.html",
    "https://teachinglab.github.io/USStateSpendingperKid.html"
  )
)

galleries3 |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    layout = "label-below",
    width = 2,
    spacing = 3
  )
```
